meta_description: "Upgrade your bathroom with this 36in. vanity top featuring a 4in. backsplash and 1.1811in. thickness. Includes a 37in. marble top, 2 drawers, and 2 doors made of solid oak. No assembly required. Sink and cabinet hardware included. 5 year commercial warranty. Made in Mexico."
meta_title: "Ansbury 36" Single Basin Vanity Set with Cabinet and Marble Top - Freestanding Design"
details:
Complete a character-filled bathroom with the Ansbury. Featuring simple panel-style doors, this durable wood build highlights the Ansbury's natural beauty. A spacious cabinet and two drawers reveal plenty of hidden storage, with a convenient spot for linens or baskets available below thanks to a slatted open shelf. Ensuring smooth, quiet use, soft-closing hinges or slides are built in at each entry point.

Included Components:

  • Covered under Signature Hardware's 25 year limited warranty
  • Each stone top is carved from a single piece of stone and will feature natural variations
  • See installation instructions for directions to attach the vanity top and sink
  • All dimensions are +/- 1/2"
  • Wood vanity cabinet with 2 doors and 2 drawers
  • Marble vanity top with a single sink and backsplash
  • Faucet is not included and must be purchased separately

Cabinet Features:

  • Constructed from wood providing a lifetime of durability
  • Free standing installation - vanity is seated on the floor with wall anchors, providing a functional design
  • Double door design provides easy access to storage space
  • 2 full extension drawers with soft-close slides allows for organized storage
  • Soft close drawer slides operate on smooth ball-bearings and prevent drawers from slamming shut
  • Vanity cabinet includes matching decorative hardware

Vanity Top Features:

  • Vanity top includes a single basin sink constructed of Vitreous China
  • 3 pre-drilled faucet holes
  • Each sink features its own rectangular single basin workspace
  • Rear drain location increases available space under the sink
  • Vanity top includes matching backsplash

Cabinet Specifications:

  • Number of Doors: 2
  • Number of Drawers: 2

Vanity Top Specifications:

  • Vanity Top Width: 37" (left edge to right edge)
  • Vanity Top Depth: 22" (front edge to back edge)
  • Backsplash Height: 4"
  • Number of Basins: 1
  • Sink Measurements: 14-1/4"W x 18-1/4"L
  • Sink Cutout Length: 15" (left to right)
  • Sink Cutout Width: 11" (front to back)
  • Number of Faucet Holes: 3
  • Faucet Centers: 8"
